thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to visit the first URL in martial_arts_urls.txt file and save the contents of the page to a file called first_url.txt using the curl command.
thoughts.reasoning: Since lynx was not found on the system, we can use curl command to download the contents of the webpage.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the command 'head -n 1 martial_arts_urls.txt' to get the first URL in the file.
- Use the command 'curl <url> -o first_url.txt' to download the contents of the webpage and save it to a file called first_url.txt.
thoughts.criticism: I should have checked whether lynx was installed on the system before trying to use it.
thoughts.speak: I suggest using the curl command to download the contents of the first URL in martial_arts_urls.txt file and save it to a file called first_url.txt.
